summary: This mod disables the icon and "Current Location" text on the map for more immersive (non GPS) navigation through Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Hi, this is my first ever mod for Skyrim!

It disables the icon and "Current Location" text on the map for more immersive (non GPS) navigation through Skyrim.

There are few similiar mods around here but they are too outdated and no one hides the "Current Location" text from the map. My mod does. And its also very lightweight and simple in its core. It won't break your game or harm your savefile.

[b][color=#ff7700][size=4]WARNING! SkyUI 5.1 REQUIRED. Place it after SkyUI in load order.

[/size][/color][/b][color=#ff0000][size=3]This version currently not working with NMM. Use Mod Organizer instead. Support for NMM coming soon!

[/size][/color]Update v.1.1 : Disabled rollover mouse sounds.


Enjoy!
author: Viente
